result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dashawn D Buford

records.addlTxt:
8:51 AM Defendant Dashawn D Buford appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Heather M Faeh appeared by video for Dashawn D Buford.  Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
State moves to dismiss and read in this file as part of the plea agreement with 22CM365.  Motion granted.
Letter from defendant to Judge Dietz.
Letter from defendant requesting bail reduction.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Offer deadline with DA is set for 08-19-22 at 8:30 a.m.   Scheduling conference is set for 09-07-22 at 10:30 a.m.    
Minutes.
Re:  PTC Misdemeanor bail jumping, on 06-18-22.
Order to report to MTPD for photo and prints

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of PTC bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-07-22 at 10:30 a.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release and defendant is to have no contact with L.M.M.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
